about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack composed by Bettina Calmon for the indie game "My own little planet".
The soundtrack includes 13 heart-warming musics that you will spend the eternity listening! Plus a special art of the soundtrack cover!

Soundtrack list :

1- My own little planet
2- Simple things
3- Dark Boy
4- Fear in a jar
5- Life to ruin
6- Mr.Pincher's chase
7- Buried heart
8- Doppelganger
9- Lost inside
10- The Freakshow
11- As i told you
12- Forgive me father
13- But i have to kill you

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Celeron or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Directx 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 2 duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Directx 9.0c over
